text: Brita Koivunen-Einiö (31 August 1931 - 12 April 2014) was a Finnish jazz and schlager singer. Some of her most famous songs include "Suklaasydän", "Sävel rakkauden" and "Mamma, tuo mies minua tuijottaa" all from the 1950s. She was born in Helsinki. Koivunen died on 12 April 2014 in Helsinki, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Brita Koivunen biography Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Finnish jazz musicians Category:Singers from Helsinki
title: Brita Koivunen
